SELECT gtr.admin_name as keyCode, sum(fee) as feeValue FROM galaxy_turnover_record gtr
WHERE gtr.deleted = 0
GROUP BY gtr.admin_name, gtr.admin_id

SELECT gtr.fee_type_desc as keyCode, sum(fee) as feeValue FROM galaxy_turnover_record gtr
WHERE gtr.deleted = 0
GROUP BY gtr.fee_type_desc, gtr.fee_type
